text.div:
Id: ANCDT28
Url: http://fhir.org/guides/who/anc-cds/PlanDefinition/ANCDT28
Version: 0.3.0
Identifier:

value: ANC.DT.28

Name: ANCDT28
Title: ANC.DT.28 Gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) risk counselling
Status: active
Experimental: false
Type:

system: http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/plan-definition-type

code: eca-rule

Date: 2021-06-11T23:42:28-06:00
Publisher: World Health Organization (WHO)
Description: If the woman has risk factors for developing gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM), provide counselling to reduce risk of developing GDM
Use Context:
codevaluedisplay
task ANC.B9. Conduct laboratory tests and imaging
Jurisdiction: 001
Libraries:
http://fhir.org/guides/who/anc-cds/Library/ANCDT28
Actions:
ANC.DT.28 Gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) risk counselling:
When: named-event: ANC.B9. Conduct laboratory tests and imaging
Then:
The woman is considered at risk for GDM if she has any of the following risk factors: – BMI of 30 kg/m2 or more – Previous GDM – Previous macrosomia – Glycosuria on dipstick testing is ++ or above on one occasion OR + on two or more occasions Please provide appropriate counseling for GDM risk mitigation, including: – Reasserting dietary interventions – Reasserting physical activity during pregnancy
If: applicability: ((((((("BMI" ≥ 30) AND ("Gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) diagnosis" = "GDM negative") AND ("Diabetes mellitus (DM) during pregnancy diagnosis" = "DM negative")) OR (("Past pregnancy complications" = "Gestational diabetes mellitus") AND ("Gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) diagnosis" = "GDM negative") AND ("Diabetes mellitus (DM) during pregnancy diagnosis" = "DM negative"))) OR (("Past pregnancy complications" = "Macrosomia") AND ("Gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) diagnosis" = "GDM negative") AND ("Diabetes mellitus (DM) during pregnancy diagnosis" = "DM negative"))) OR (("Urine dipstick result – glucose" = "++") AND ("Gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) diagnosis" = "GDM negative") AND ("Diabetes mellitus (DM) during pregnancy diagnosis" = "DM negative"))) OR (("Urine dipstick result – glucose" = "+++") AND ("Gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) diagnosis" = "GDM negative") AND ("Diabetes mellitus (DM) during pregnancy diagnosis" = "DM negative"))) OR (("Urine dipstick result – glucose" = "++++") AND ("Gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) diagnosis" = "GDM negative") AND ("Diabetes mellitus (DM) during pregnancy diagnosis" = "DM negative"))) OR (("Urine dipstick result – glucose" = "+" ON MORE THAN ONE TEST ACROSS PREGNANCY) AND ("Gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) diagnosis" = "GDM negative") AND ("Diabetes mellitus (DM) during pregnancy diagnosis" = "DM negative")) (Should Provide counselling on gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) risk)

name: ANCDT28
title: ANC.DT.28 Gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) risk counselling
description: If the woman has risk factors for developing gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM), provide counselling to reduce risk of developing GDM

action.title: ANC.DT.28 Gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) risk counselling

trigger.name: ANC.B9. Conduct laboratory tests and imaging

action.title: Provide counselling on gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) risk
action.description: Provide counselling on gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) risk
action.textEquivalent:
The woman is considered at risk for GDM if she has any of the following risk factors: 
– BMI of 30 kg/m2 or more
– Previous GDM
– Previous macrosomia 
– Glycosuria on dipstick testing is ++ or above on one occasion OR + on two or more occasions

Please provide appropriate counseling for GDM risk mitigation, including: 
– Reasserting dietary interventions
– Reasserting physical activity during pregnancy

expression.description:
((((((("BMI" ≥ 30)
  AND ("Gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) diagnosis" = "GDM negative")
  AND ("Diabetes mellitus (DM) during pregnancy diagnosis" = "DM negative"))
  OR (("Past pregnancy complications" = "Gestational diabetes mellitus")
  AND ("Gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) diagnosis" = "GDM negative")
  AND ("Diabetes mellitus (DM) during pregnancy diagnosis" = "DM negative")))
  OR (("Past pregnancy complications" = "Macrosomia")
  AND ("Gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) diagnosis" = "GDM negative")
  AND ("Diabetes mellitus (DM) during pregnancy diagnosis" = "DM negative")))
  OR (("Urine dipstick result – glucose" = "++")
  AND ("Gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) diagnosis" = "GDM negative")
  AND ("Diabetes mellitus (DM) during pregnancy diagnosis" = "DM negative")))
  OR (("Urine dipstick result – glucose" = "+++")
  AND ("Gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) diagnosis" = "GDM negative")
  AND ("Diabetes mellitus (DM) during pregnancy diagnosis" = "DM negative")))
  OR (("Urine dipstick result – glucose" = "++++")
  AND ("Gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) diagnosis" = "GDM negative")
  AND ("Diabetes mellitus (DM) during pregnancy diagnosis" = "DM negative")))
  OR (("Urine dipstick result – glucose" = "+" ON MORE THAN ONE TEST ACROSS PREGNANCY)
  AND ("Gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) diagnosis" = "GDM negative")
  AND ("Diabetes mellitus (DM) during pregnancy diagnosis" = "DM negative"))
expression.expression: Should Provide counselling on gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) risk
